name: pdf-to-epub
title: PDF to EPUB Converter
description: Convert PDF documents to EPUB ebook format with customizable metadata
content:
Overview

This application converts PDF documents into EPUB ebook format. Built using PyMuPDF and ebooklib, it extracts text from PDFs and creates properly formatted EPUB files with table of contents and metadata.

Features

  • Convert PDF to EPUB format
  • Extract and preserve text content
  • Automatic chapter creation (one per page)
  • Customizable metadata (title, author, language)
  • Built-in table of contents
  • Professional styling and formatting

Parameters

  • PDF File: Upload the PDF file to convert
  • Book Title: (Optional) Set the book title
  • Author: Set the author name (default: Unknown)
  • Language: Set the book language code (default: en)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the EPUB file

Output

The application generates an EPUB file named {original_name}.epub containing the extracted PDF content formatted as an ebook.

Use Cases

  • Converting documents to ebook format
  • Making PDFs readable on e-readers
  • Creating ebook libraries from PDFs
  • Publishing content in EPUB format
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/pdf_to_epub.py" "${pdfPath}" -t "${bookTitle}" -a "${author}" -l "${language}" -o "${outputDir}"
